item.title: ALIT
item.description: score:8 Chances: Alight Worklife delivers AI-driven workforce support, extensive benefits management and financial and wellbeing features Risks: CEO sold a significant number of shares on March 20, 2024 Company is selling two units for up to $1.2 billion Score:8 chances characters count - risks characters count = 8
